Let Us Cater Your Next Event

From customized box lunches to full spreads, we’ll take care of the details. Eggs Up Grill catering makes it easy and delicious. Call now to place your catering order!

Phone
+1 843-212-5255 Order Catering Click Here E Gift Cards Sign Up Now! 
About Us

I am Kevin Arnold. My wife and I work hard to build a strong connection with the local community here in West Ashley. At Eggs Up Grill, guests will always experience genuine hospitality from people who live in their community and who they come to know and trust — truly neighbors serving neighbors. Our restaurants are happy places for every occasion, where all feel welcome. Eggs Up Grill is a place to come to by yourself, with family, friends, neighbors, or coworkers. Our door is always open to all.We look forward to seeing you in our restaurant. If there is anything we can do for you or our community, please let us know.
